name: OpenZIM Wiki Archive
summary: Learn about .ZIM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content:
ZIM file format was developed on top of Zeno file format and is not backwards compatible. The format specifications of ZIM file format are available online by openZIM for developerâ€™s reference. OpenZIM has provided C++ open source implementation, LibZim, for reading and writing ZIM files.

ZIM file format uses LZMA2 compression to make the content compact.
Developers can use the free ZIMLib C++ library to incorporate OpenZIM content in their applications.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
